verses.verse: And I, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you as to <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4152>men,<s%> but as to <S%G4560>men<s%> of <S%G4560>flesh,<s%> as to <S%G3516>babes<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G4222>gave<s%> you <S%G1051>milk<s%> to <S%G4222>drink,<s%> not solid <S%G1033>food;<s%> for you were not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> [to receive it.] <S%G235>Indeed,<s%> <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> you are not <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1410>able,<s%>

for you are <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4559>fleshly.<s%> For <S%G3699>since<s%> there is <S%G2205>jealousy<s%> and <S%G2054>strife<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, are you not <S%G4559>fleshly,<s%> and are you not <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G2596>like<s%> mere <S%G444>men<s%>?
For <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul,<s%>" and <S%G2087>another,<s%> "I am of <S%G625>Apollos,<s%>" are you not [mere] <S%G444>men<s%>?

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is <S%G625>Apollos<s%>? And <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G3972>Paul<s%>? <S%G1249>Servants<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> [opportunity] to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one.<s%>
I <S%G5452>planted,<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G4222>watered,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G837>causing<s%> the <S%G837>growth.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> the one who <S%G5452>plants<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> the one who <S%G4222>waters<s%> is <S%G5100>anything,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G837>causes<s%> the <S%G837>growth.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he who <S%G5452>plants<s%> and he who <S%G4222>waters<s%> are <S%G1520>one;<s%> but <S%G1538>each<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2873>labor.<s%>
For we are God's <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>workers;<s%> you are God's <S%G1091>field,<s%> God's <S%G3619>building.<s%>

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, as a <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G753>master<s%> <S%G753>builder<s%> I <S%G5087>laid<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation,<s%> and <S%G243>another<s%> is <S%G2026>building<s%> upon it. But let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> be <S%G991>careful<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G2026>builds<s%> upon it.

For <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the one which is <S%G2749>laid,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2026>builds<s%> upon the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> with <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G694>silver,<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> <S%G3586>wood,<s%> <S%G5528>hay,<s%> <S%G2562>straw,<s%>

<S%G1538>each<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> will <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5318>evident;<s%> for the <S%G2250>day<s%> will <S%G1213>show<s%> it, <S%G3754>because<s%> it is [to be] <S%G601>revealed<s%> with <S%G4442>fire;<s%> and the <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> will <S%G1381>test<s%> the <S%G3697>quality<s%> of <S%G1538>each<s%> man's <S%G2041>work.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G2026>built<s%> upon it <S%G3306>remains,<s%> he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G3408>reward.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> is <S%G2618>burned<s%> up, he shall <S%G2210>suffer<s%> <S%G2210>loss;<s%> but he <S%G846>himself<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> as <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that you are a <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and [that] the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in you?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5351>destroys<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G5351>destroy<s%> him, for the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> and that is <S%G3748>what<s%> you are.

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G1380>thinks<s%> that he is <S%G4680>wise<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age,<s%> let him <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> that he may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G4680>wise.<s%>

For the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "[He is] the one who <S%G1405>catches<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> in their <S%G3834>craftiness<s%>";
and <S%G3825>again,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> the <S%G1261>reasonings<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> that they are <S%G3152>useless.<s%>"
<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then<s%> let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> in <S%G444>men.<s%> For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1510>belong<s%> to you,

<S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1764>things<s%> <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G3195>things<s%> to <S%G3195>come;<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> belong to you,
and you belong to <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> belongs to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
